tech.lity.rea.skatolo.file

Class ControllerProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • tech.lity.rea.skatolo.file.ControllerProperties

  • public class ControllerProperties
extends Object
    Values of controllers can be stored inside properties files which can be saved to file or memory.

      ControllerProperties register(ControllerInterface<?> theController, String theProperty)
      registering a property with only one parameter assumes that there is a setter and getter function present for the Controller. register("value") for example would create a property reference to setValue and getValue.

      adds a property based on names of setter and getter methods of a controller.

      removes a snapshot by key.

      saves all registered properties into the default 'skatolo.properties' file into your sketch folder.

      saves all registered properties into a file specified by parameter thePropertiesPath.

      saves a list of properties sets into a file specified by parameter thePropertiesPath.

      saves a snapshot into your sketch's sketch folder.
      ControllerProperties saveSnapshotAs(String thePropertiesPath, String theKey)
      saves a snapshot to the file with path given by the first parameter (thePropertiesPath).

      use ControllerProperties.SERIALIZED, ControllerProperties.XML or ControllerProperties.JSON as parameter.

      ControllerProperties updateSnapshot(String theKey)

      • register

        public ControllerProperties register(ControllerInterface<?> theController,
                                     String theProperty)
        registering a property with only one parameter assumes that there is a setter and getter function present for the Controller. register("value") for example would create a property reference to setValue and getValue. Notice that the first letter of value is being capitalized.
        Parameters:
        theProperty -
        Returns:

      • setSnapshot

        public ControllerProperties setSnapshot(String theKey)
        logs all registered properties in memory. Here, clones of properties are stored inside a map and can be accessed by key using the getLog method.
        Parameters:
        theKey -
        Returns:
        ControllerProperties
        See Also:
        skatolo.ControllerProperties#getSnapshot(String)

      • updateSnapshot

        public ControllerProperties updateSnapshot(String theKey)
        convenience method, setSnapshot(String) also works here since it will override existing log with the same key.

      • removeSnapshot

        public ControllerProperties removeSnapshot(String theKey)
        removes a snapshot by key.

      • saveSnapshot

        public ControllerProperties saveSnapshot(String theKey)
        saves a snapshot into your sketch's sketch folder.

      • saveSnapshotAs

        public ControllerProperties saveSnapshotAs(String thePropertiesPath,
                                           String theKey)
        saves a snapshot to the file with path given by the first parameter (thePropertiesPath).

      • getSnapshot

        public ControllerProperties getSnapshot(String theKey)
        restores properties previously stored as snapshot in memory.
        See Also:
        skatolo.ControllerProperties#setSnapshot(String)

      • getSnapshotIndices

        public ArrayList<String> getSnapshotIndices()
        properties stored in memory can be accessed by index, getSnapshotIndices() returns the index of the snapshot list.

      • load

        public boolean load()
        load properties from the default properties file 'skatolo.properties'
